def test_constant_strategy_regressor():

    random_state = np.random.RandomState(seed=1)

    X = [[0]] * 5  # ignored
    y = random_state.randn(5)

    reg = DummyRegressor(strategy="constant", constant=[43])
    reg.fit(X, y)
    assert_array_equal(reg.predict(X), [43] * len(X))

    reg = DummyRegressor(strategy="constant", constant=43)
    reg.fit(X, y)
    assert_array_equal(reg.predict(X), [43] * len(X))
